dmca.title: DMCA notice of copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the
material that is claimed to be infringing, and information reasonably
sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said material. 

 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Pam Winter [mailto:pam@hairtostay.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2006 12:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA notice of copyright infringement


Good Day,

My name is Pam Winter and I am notifying you that one of the websites you
host is infringing on my copyrights.  I have notified them and they have not
removed the content.

My copyrighted content is located at

http://www.asvoyeur.com/hairy/93f228/


If you wish to contact me, you may do so:  Winter Publishing, Inc., Pam
Winter, owner, 16 Sconticut Neck Road, Fairhaven, MA  02719.  telephone
508.999.0078

I, Pam Winter, have a good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner  complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, Pam Winter,
its agent, or the law.

The information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, that I, Pam Winter, am  authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Pam Winter
owner
Winter Publishing, Inc.
